frame.name: Kickback Collective
frame.subtitle: Your real-time football chat and insights hub
frame.description: A community platform for football fans to share live match insights and banter with real-time chat, user-generated content, and fan networking.
frame.tagline: Never miss a moment of the action
frame.ogDescription: Join the ultimate football fan community. Share live match insights, engage in real-time banter, and connect with fellow fans.
